snippet: Brian Bennett joined PPC Associates, San Mateo, Calif., in a new post, vice president for sales and customer development. He had most recently been at Conductor, New York.
lead_paragraph: Brian Bennett joined PPC Associates, San Mateo, Calif., in a new post, vice president for sales and customer development. He had most recently been at Conductor, New York.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Advertising Industry
